profile.name: Charles Oliver Nutter
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Headius Enterprises | Performance Optimization Expert
profile.summary: Highly experienced developer with a strong background in JRuby, TruffleRuby, and GraalVM. Proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions and ensuring compatibility across different Ruby versions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Headius Enterprises
description: Led the development of a Java Foreign Function Interface (JFFI) for improved performance and compatibility with JRuby.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with other technologies, including TruffleRuby and GraalVM.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed high-performance solutions for clients using JRuby and other related technologies.
Provided expert advice on performance optimization, bug fixing, and compatibility with different Ruby versions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of JRuby's performance optimization efforts, including the development of a Java DSL for binding method handles forward.
Ensured compatibility between JRuby and different Ruby versions, including Ruby 3.4 and Ruby 4.0.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using JRuby and other related technologies.
Provided expert advice on performance optimization, bug fixing, and compatibility with different Ruby versions.

points: Java DSL for binding method handles forward
